# Distribution Folder

This `dist` folder contains all zipped plugin packages generated by the build scripts.

## Purpose

After executing either:
- `build_plugins.sh` (Linux/macOS)
- `build_plugins.bat` (Windows)

All compiled and packaged plugins will be copied to this directory as ZIP files.

## Contents

The folder will contain:
- `positioner-<plugin-name>.zip` - Positioner plugin package
- `signalanalyzer-<plugin-name>.zip` - Signal Analyzer plugin package  
- `signalgenerator-<plugin-name>.zip` - Signal Generator plugin package

## Usage

1. Run the appropriate build script for your platform
2. Check this folder for the generated ZIP files
3. Use these ZIP files for distribution or installation

## Notes

- This folder is automatically created by the build scripts if it doesn't exist
- Old ZIP files may be overwritten when rebuilding
- Always check the build script output for any errors during the packaging process
